name: Wizard Lost In Maze
description:
Wizard Lost In Maze is a dungeon-crawler game with a Gameboy aesthetic. 

You control a wizard trapped in a labyrinthine dungeon. Cross the 3 floors to the exit. Be careful, many monsters will stand in your way! Explore to find powerful spells to face them.

This game was made for the #GBJAM 9 a game jam with the theme "Original GameBoy".

Controls
  • D-PAD: Arrow Keys -> Move & Choose in menu
  • A: Q -> Accept in menu
  • B: W -> Hold to run & Cancel in menu
  • Start: Space
Credits

All assets were made by me, Nicolas Vivier aka Nicovi. 

That was my first project using Godot as game engine (it was quite interesting and I really like some concepts like the scene tree system or the observer design pattern).

Graphics were made with Aseprite.

Sounds were created with ChipTone.

Musics were made with BandLab (and its Gameboy Power Pack).
